extendedInfo.description: Armorslays Version 2 Launch!!Armorslays Version 1 was over 1,500,000 players and Got No.1 Action Game in Asia. We collect playersâ suggestion to launch Version 2.Armorslays sends hundreds of bosses and their minions to threaten your Front Lines, your Seabase and Jungle Territory. You are completely on your own! It is lucky that you are a survivor, a robot who bears several weapons and has the ability to fight on land and sea.Armorslays utilizes a fast and easy to use digital joystick navigation. It allows you to use two fingers at once: One for movement, the other to shoot your gun or pull your sword. The more enemies that die, the more money you will earn. But be sure to invest it wisely. Spend your hard-earned cash on a new robot look or perhaps more powerful weapons or even special boosts which will make you stronger that give you a boost for land, sea or sky battles.If you have any suggestion, please feedback me in review list. We must do the best to upgrade this game.New features in Ver. 2 :- Armor Level Up- Eight different Armor characters- Stage mode for each Map- More powerful weapons- Innumerable bosses and minions waiting for their defeat

reviews.title: Oh .. almost forget
reviews.comment: Also add in multiplayer mode so it is more fun
reviews.author: Darren Liew

reviews.title: Decent game, needs content and improvements. Play it!
reviews.comment: Okay, this isn\'t near as bad as everyone says. Download the game and RELAX, this definitely needs improvements but its a solid start.  Needs clear statistics to show how far you\'ve progressed in achievements. How many times have I died?   More maps, weapons, and upgrades are needed.   For the devs; play fantashooting. The character upgrades, RPG elements, etc make this genre much better. Allowing for a leveling system would skyrocket sales. Proficiencies in weapons, and more varied stages akin to fantashoot

reviews.comment: Well i was recommended to get this game by a friend so i downloaded it and opened the app, then it wouldn\'t load past the \"powered by unity\" screen so i unistalled as i have had problems with apps in the past... reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I noticed a couple problems. . .
reviews.comment: Good game but I noticed a couple problems. One it seems the controls continue to get stuck basically when shooting or moving around occasionally the attack button gets stuck then I end up unable to move for a couple seconds. Two it does take a little bit too long to collect money I understand the need to make the game challenging but this seems a little bit excessive. As is I rate it 3stars great game just a couple problems.
